articles.title: Tesla renews legal fight to reinstate Elon Musk's $56B pay package after shareholders back deal
articles.description:
In January, Delaware Chancery Court Judge Kathaleen McCormick voided Musk’s stock-based compensation plan, which she referred to as an “unfathomable sum.” The package was challenged in a lawsuit filed by Tesla shareholder Richard Tornetta.

articles.title: Self-driving Tesla crashes into police car as driver uses phone, California cops say
articles.description: A Tesla in self-drive mode crashed into a cop car as its driver used their cellphone, California police say. Read full story
